key_risk_themes: ["Infrastructure Readiness & Complexity","Distributed System Resilience & Performance","CI/CD Security & Quality Gating"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize and resource EPIC-009 (Infrastructure Setup) to unblock all development and validate the deployment pipeline.","Address the 'super-node' fan-out risk with a hybrid model design before implementing the feed service.","Tune security scanners in the CI/CD pipeline to reduce false positives and ensure developer adoption."]
